channel.title: Need help with webclient (please can someone help me?)
channel.description:
hello,
I am finished with coding my server and I wanted to make a webclient. I made an application from my client, but if I wanna play it, it gives an error: [i]Error: Invalid or corrupt jarfile C:\Users\Kids\Desktop\application.jar[/i] I have a signed file of it, and if I double klick that nothing happen. I have also made a webclient already but if you wanna play it it says: [i][b]ClassformatError[/b] incompatible magic value 1008813135 in class file client[/i] wat should I do so it work?

item.title: Need help with webclient (please can someone help me?)
item.dc:creator: @Luuck Luuck
item.description:
@Luuck wrote:

hello,

I am finished with coding my server and I wanted to make a webclient.
I made an application from my client, but if I wanna play it, it gives an error: Error: Invalid or corrupt jarfile C:\Users\Kids\Desktop\application.jar
I have a signed file of it, and if I double klick that nothing happen.
I have also made a webclient already but if you wanna play it it says:
ClassformatError
incompatible magic value 1008813135 in class file client
wat should I do so it work?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with webclient (please can someone help me?)
